Subskills.name: Mayhem Up
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of bullets fired with absolute mayhem.

Subskills.name: Absolute Carnage
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by absolute mayhem.

Subskills.name: Impact Shrapnel
Subskills.description: Bullets now break into fragments traveling in an arc behind the target dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Colossal Barrel
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of absolute mayhem bullets.

Subskills.name: Stocked Capacity
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of absolute mayhem.

Subskills.name: Hypothermic Rounds
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict freeze on hit.

Subskills.name: Bonehit
Subskills.description: Chance to knock monsters back dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Explosive Empowered Rounds
Subskills.description: Chance for bullets to explode and fragment on hit unleashing shrapnel around the target.

Subskills.name: Maniac Mayhem
Subskills.description: The Demonslayer changes his weapon into a demonic minigun which uncontrollably fires bullets for a short duration before breaking.

Subskills.name: Fear the Gun
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt by absolute mayhem.

Subskills.name: Bicep Curls
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using absolute mayhem.

Subskills.name: Line of Fire
Subskills.description: Fire additional trail of bullets in an arc.

Subskills.name: Explosion Vacuum
Subskills.description: Fire a single bullet which vacuums all nearby monsters and unleashes a big explosion.
